/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's daily life. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings and trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. A few cars and motorcycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the rhythm of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a serene backdrop to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye down the street towards the horizon.
